data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Arias, Erick, Chaves, Gerardo, Salazar, Stanley, Salazar-Zúñiga, José Andrés, García-Rodríguez, Adrián (2019): A new species of dink frog, genus Diasporus (Anura: Eleutherodactylidae), from the Caribbean foothills of the Cordillera de Talamanca, Costa Rica. Zootaxa 4609 (2): 269-288, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4609.2.4|2 occurrences
